SASS Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2015-04-13  | Version: 1.0
SASS Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

sass:compile

Full name:

com.learningobjects:sass-maven-plugin:1.0:compile

Description:

Compiles SASS into CSS.

This plugin scans for subdirectories of sassSourceDirectory called sass containing .scss files. For each SASS file, an associated CSS file is created in a relative css directory under the cssTargetDirectory.

For example, using the default parameters, if there is a SASS input file at /src/main/resources/com/mycompany/sass/styles.scss, then an associated CSS output file will be created at /target/classes/com/mycompany/css/styles.css.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-resources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
cssTargetDirectory String 1.0 Target directory where CSS files will be generated under according to the relative path of the source SASS files.
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}.
sassSourceDirectory String 1.0 Source directory containing one or more sass sub-directories, which contain one or more .scss files.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/resources.

Parameter Details

cssTargetDirectory:

Target directory where CSS files will be generated under according to the relative path of the source SASS files.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.outputDirectory}

sassSourceDirectory:

Source directory containing one or more sass sub-directories, which contain one or more .scss files.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/resources
